citation.source: International Journal of Systematic and Evolutionary Microbiology

p.s: Armatimonadia (Ar.ma.ti.mo.naâ€²di.a. N.L. fem. n. Armatimonas type genus of the type order of the class; suff. -ia ending to donate a class; N.L. neut. pl. n. Armatimonadia the class of the order Armatimonadales).
The class Armatimonadia includes bacteria belonging to the phylum Armatimonadetes phyl. nov.
Members of this class mainly inhabit mesophilic terrestrial environments, e.g. freshwater lakes and rivers.
The delineation of the class is primarily determined based on phylogenetic analysis of 16S rRNA gene sequences.
